extendedInfo.description: This App is to access your National University Online course. With the National University Mobile app, you can now access your class information and engage with your classmates anytime, anywhere.â¢	Activity - Quickly view the recent activity from your courses, including thread topics and responses, dropbox submissions, and gradesâ¢	Upcoming - See scheduled items from your courses, including threads, content items, quizzes and exams â¢	Discussions - Read thread topics and respond to your instructor or classmates â¢	Announcements - Quickly see what is happening in your courses â¢	Gradebook - View grades and comments on your assignments â¢	People - Easy access to others in your course

reviews.title: Works great, very convenient
reviews.comment: I have been using this app for about five months on different Android devices and it works great. It is very convenient for posting to discussion boards and checking grades on the go. Just wish it would add the ability to view unit assignments and syllabuses.
reviews.author: Matt Nelson

reviews.title: Several Issues
reviews.comment: 1) New Line character completely ignored on Discussion Board  2) Can only view DB Topics after a person has already posted in one.  3) Too limited to do anything other than checking for announcements when logging on to a PC isn\'t possible.
reviews.author: Donabed Kopoian

reviews.title: Wont let me login
reviews.comment: This app won\'t let me login, and I\'m using Android as others have also experienced. I have verified that I\'m using the correct login information (the same that I use to login through the school website).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t log in
reviews.comment: It might be a decent app if I could log in. Using same username/password that i do on the computer, but says it\'s wrong..  I\'m out a lot and would like to use this helpful app.
reviews.author: Marcus Johnson

reviews.title: Can be better
reviews.comment: I have been using this app only to read and respond to posts with my classmates.  Unfortunately, I\'m no able to view the full menu, week schedules, basically everything in the tab.  There is so much that needs to be done.  I hope the maker will re-make the app to be for user friendly that will allow us to view the schedules and discussion without having to have a classmate post up a response in order to see the discussions.
reviews.author: tracy xiong

reviews.title: Good for checking grades and viewing discussions.
reviews.comment: It\'s easier just to bookmark the site
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boo
reviews.comment: Won\'t even let me log in...
reviews.author: jason hunter

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app! It does what it says! Easy access to my classes!
reviews.author: rama bulkin

reviews.title: Not too bad
reviews.comment: My biggest problem is that the application won\'t let me view in landscape mode.
reviews.author: Alex Orosco

reviews.title: Fix!
reviews.comment: I like the fact that I can stay connected and posted with my assignments and classmates. Hate the fact it stops working and I have to uninstall and reinstall to get it to work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lacks many components
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t give grade updates. Doesn\'t give assignment list. Can\'t view each unit to see reading or discussion topics. What\'s the point?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t....
reviews.comment: Waste your time. Login once, black screen a second time. Have to uninstall/reinstall with every use. Best bet is to use internet browser to login to class. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: So far no problem with login and navigation but aint much to do here except check grades.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: What the hell?!?!?! Must force close before starting. Fix this problem!!!! My iPhone was fine but you can\'t fix the android problem???
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please update?
reviews.comment: Can you please update this app? It no longer works in Android 4.1.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hm...
reviews.comment: Classes aren\'t just discussion boards. Where are my assignments? Grades? Dropbox?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix for jellybean
reviews.comment: Does not work for android 4.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: The old version was great; it is now a waste. Would be good if you were able to access more of the class features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tierra
reviews.comment: this is good for just checking yiur grades and course announcements. i would like it more if we could actually view items from
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t deserve one star...it wasted my time to download it. Doesn\'t work, won\'t let me log on. Says login info is wrong. Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: A Google User
